name: Haguess
overview: Haguess specializes in Smart Card solutions and development of transaction systems. The company has implemented several municipal projects with the largest reference being capital city of Czech Republic, Prague. In municipal projects Haguess takes care of both front and back office operations as well as of SC application development, testing and implementing. Previously, Haguess has been developing banking information systems across various countries in Europe. Haguess therefor strives to integrate broader, both commercial and public e-purse services into its Smart Card solutions. Currently the largest applications running are subscription application for transport services, e-purse for parking payments, secure access to internet sites using different kinds of certificates, loyalty or discount application for city and state organizations, Identification card for several city organizations.
